Title: Fist of Fury
Plot: Chen Chen returns to his former school in Shanghai when he learns that his beloved instructor has been murdered. While investigating the man's death, Chen discovers that a rival Japanese school is operating a drug smuggling ring. To avenge his master’s death, Chen takes on both Chinese and Japanese assassins… and even a towering Russian.
Tagline: Bruce Lee has done the impossible... ...HE'S SURPASSED HIMSELF!!!
Stars: Bruce Lee, Nora Miao, Maria Yi
